formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the web application to be checked. i.e: 'webapp'.

formElement.label: Wsadmin Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of wsadmin, including filename and extension. i.e: '/path/to/wsadmin.sh' or 'wsadmin.bat'.

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
